meanings.sent1: She accidentally mousled her hair while playing outside.
meanings.sent2: The wind mousled the leaves, scattering them across the yard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy loved to mousle the neatly arranged pillows.
meanings.sent4: The playful breeze seemed to mousle the calm surface of the lake.
meanings.sent5: The child's hands were covered in paint, ready to mousle the blank canvas.

meanings.sent1: He tried to mousle the heavy box up the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The toddler tended to mousle his toys when he played.
meanings.sent3: The chef warned his apprentice not to mousle the delicate pastries.
meanings.sent4: The storm seemed to mousle the branches of the old tree.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic had to mousle with the stubborn bolt to loosen it.
